Sys.setenv(REDIVIS_API_TOKEN = "AAACP+iMkCP41u+XMORLrR49kZJtscgl")

user <- redivis::user("mcfrank")
dataset <- user$dataset("item_response_warehouse")

metadata <- dataset$query("SELECT * FROM `metadata`")$to_tibble()

ojs_define(data = metadata)
ggplot(metadata, 
       aes(x = rows)) + 
  geom_histogram()
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.

data3 = FileAttachment("csvs/metadata.csv").csv({typed: true})
data3
Plot.plot({
  y: {grid: true},
  marks: [
    Plot.rectY(data3, Plot.binX({y: "count"}, {x: "rows"})),
    Plot.ruleY([0])
  ]
})
Plot.plot({
  grid: true,
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(data3, {x: "n_items", y: "n_participants"})
  ]
})
Plot.plot({
  grid: true,
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(transpose(data), {x: "n_items", y: "n_participants"})
  ]
})
